price: او له هغوى مخكې چې كوم خلك وو، هغوى هم (رسولان) درواغجن ګڼلي و، نو بيا زما عذاب (يا نيول) څنګه و؟
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīri
